VIII.iv.4.A.8.g
.
Coding the Rating Decision to Reflect Entitlement to A&A or Housebound
Show entitlement to SMC, based on the need for A&A or evidence showing the Veteran is housebound, by
using the appropriate narrative rating code on the
Codesheet
, immediately following statement of the combined degree of disability, and
entering the necessary SMC codes in the data table.
Reference
:  For more information on proper SMC coding to ensure the Veteran’s rate is correctly adjusted during hospitalization, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, 1.C.1.f
.
